AI Description: ipmitool is an open-source utility for managing and configuring devices that support the Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI) specification. It allows users to interact with IPMI-enabled devices to retrieve information, perform system management tasks, and monitor hardware sensors remotely.
Core Features: Retrieve System Information Remotely, Configure & Manage Ipmi-Enabled Devices, Monitor Hardware Sensors & Power Usage, Reset Or Power Cycle Systems Remotely, Execute Pre-Defined Commands On Remote Machines
General Tags: System Management, Hardware Monitoring, Remote Administration, Open Source
